Commands.Deprotect (XIII): Magic BRV attack  Target: 2 turns DEF Down II
Commands.Dispel (XIII): Magic BRV attack  Removes 1 buff from target
Commands.Death (XIII): 3-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.  Inflicts Assassination for 1 turn.  Assassination deals a magic BRV attack after a set amount of turns.  It also deals more damage if target is debuffed.

Passives.Deprotect (XIII) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Deprotect (XIII).
Passives.Debuff Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Deprotect (XIII) Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Deprotect (XIII).
Passives.Dispel (XIII) Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Dispel (XIII).
Passives.Deprotect (XIII) Charge: Increases the max uses of Deprotect (XIII) by 1.
Passives.Dispel (XIII) BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Dispel (XIII).
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Dispel (XIII) Charge: Increases the max uses of Dispel (XIII) by 1.
Passives.Oerba's Miracle: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost Speed: Largely raises MAX BRV, slightly raises SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Deprotect (XIII) Extension: Deprotect (XIII) use count +2When using Deprotect (XIII):   Moderate damage boost   Moderate boost to effects inflicted, duration +2   Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hitAfter using Deprotect (XIII):   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (damage boost; deals extra damage to debuffed targets) for 8 turns
Passives.All Debuff Attack Boost: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Dispel (XIII) Extension: Dispel (XIII) use count +1When using Dispel (XIII):   Slight damage boost   Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hitAfter using Dispel (XIII):    HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK + HP attack) for 12 turns

Weapons.Physician's Staff CP: 15: Increases the potency of Deprotect (XIII).Extends the duration of its Defense Down.Inflicts Small Attack Down for 3 turns.
Weapons.Hunter's Rod CP: 35: Increases the potency of Dispel (XIII) and turns it into an AoE attack.Raises the number of removed buffs by 2.Raises all party members' BRV by 80% of the inflicted BRV damage.
